exercise.title: Malicious Traffic Analysis - Part 2
exercise.name: mnta_p2
exercise.shortdescription: Analyze the traffic of six malicious emails. Determine which one caused the infection.
exercise.description: Analyze the traffic of six malicious emails. Determine which one caused the infection.
exercise.tutorial:
There is a pcap of infected traffic that contains six malicious emails. Figure out which of the six emails caused the infection traffic.

Analyze the pcap named malicious_traffic_p2.pcap and answer the questions below.

question.text: What is the IP of the infected host?
What is the MAC address of the infected host?
What is the user of the infect host? Provide first and last name
What email attachment caused the infection?
What is the name of the extracted file from the attachment?
What is the name of the Trojan the attachment installed?
